Codo » Index » Epoch » Time » Stack

Class: Epoch.Time.Stack Abstract

Defined in: coffee/time.coffee
Inherits: Epoch.Time.Plot

Overview

This class is abstract. It does not perform rendering but instead formats the data so as to ease the process of rendering stacked plots.

Base class for all "stacked" plot types (e.g. bar charts, area charts, etc.)

Direct Known Subclasses

Epoch.Time.Area Epoch.Time.Bar

Instance Method Summary

  • # (void) _prepareLayers(layers) Adds stacking information for layers entering the visualization.
  • # (void) setData(data) Ensures that elements are stacked when setting the initial data.
  • # (Array) extent() Finds the correct extent to use for range axes (left and right).

Inherited Method Summary

Methods inherited from Epoch.Time.Plot

Instance Method Details

# (void) _prepareLayers(layers)

Adds stacking information for layers entering the visualization.

Parameters:

  • layers ( Array ) — Layers to stack.

# (void) setData(data)

Ensures that elements are stacked when setting the initial data.

Parameters:

  • data ( Array ) — Layered data to set for the visualization.

# (Array) extent()

Finds the correct extent to use for range axes (left and right).

Returns:

  • ( Array ) — An extent array with the first element equal to 0 and the second element equal to the maximum value amongst the stacked entries.
